tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE blockchain_network (
    network_id INT,
    network_name VARCHAR(255),
    consensus_id INT,
    voting_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (consensus_id) REFERENCES consensus_algorithms(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (voting_id) REFERENCES voting_mechanisms(id),
    PRIMARY KEY (network_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vote (
    vote_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_id INT NOT NULL,
    algorithm_id INT NOT NULL,
    vote_decision ENUM('approve', 'reject'),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
